docs.summary: Configuration class for loading command line arguments.
docs.remarks: Provides a method to parse command line parameters and collect them into a . The arguments allowed are the Windows style ("/key:value", "-key") or Unix style ("--key=value" and "-key value").
docs.example:
This is an example that sends in Windows arguments:
MyApp.exe -debug /file:log.txt
This is an example that sends in Unix arguments:
MyApp.exe -D --file log.txt --debug=yes
